verses.verse: <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> as <S%H4428>king,<s%> instead of <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> whom <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> made <S%H4427>king<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

But neither <S%H5650>he,<s%> nor his servants, nor the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah.<s%>

<S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3081>Jehucal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah,<s%> and <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6419>Pray<s%> now to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our God for <S%H430>us.<s%>
Now <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> for they had not <S%H5414>put<s%> him into <S%H1004>prison.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2428>army<s%> had come <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and when the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who were <S%H6696>besieging<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H8088>news<s%> of <S%H3389>them,<s%> they broke up from Jerusalem.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to me to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H6547>me:<s%> Behold, Pharaoh's <S%H2428>army,<s%> which has come <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H7725>you,<s%> shall return to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into their own <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against this <S%H5892>city;<s%> and they shall <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H8313>it,<s%> and burn it with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5377>Don't<s%> deceive <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> shall <S%H1980>surely<s%> <S%H3212>depart<s%> from <S%H3212>us;<s%> for they shall not depart.

For though you had <S%H5221>struck<s%> the whole <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H7604>you,<s%> and there remained but <S%H1856>wounded<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> among <S%H6965>them,<s%> yes would they rise up every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
It happened <S%H2428>that,<s%> when the army of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> was broken <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H2428>army,<s%>

then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> to receive his portion <S%H8432>there,<s%> in the midst of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

When he was in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> a <S%H1167>captain<s%> of the <S%H6488>guard<s%> was <S%H8034>there,<s%> whose name was <S%H3376>Irijah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2608>Hananiah;<s%> and he laid <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You are falling <S%H5307>away<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H8267>false;<s%> I am not falling <S%H5307>away<s%> to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%> But he <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H3376>him;<s%> so Irijah laid <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H8610>brought<s%> him to the <S%H8269>princes.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> were <S%H7107>angry<s%> with <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5414>him,<s%> and put him in <S%H612>prison<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe;<s%> for they had <S%H6213>made<s%> that the <S%H3608>prison.<s%>

When <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> had come <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H1004>dungeon<s%> <S%H2588>house,<s%> and into the cells, and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> had <S%H3427>remained<s%> there <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%>

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> <S%H4428>him:<s%> and the king <S%H7592>asked<s%> him <S%H5643>secretly<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is there any <S%H1697>word<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> There <S%H3426>is.<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5414>also,<s%> You shall be delivered into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah,<s%> Wherein have I <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H5650>you,<s%> or against your servants, or against this <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you have <S%H5414>put<s%> me in <S%H1004>prison?<s%>

Where <S%H346>now<s%> are your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> against <S%H776>you,<s%> nor against this land?

Now please <S%H8085>hear,<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king:<s%> please let my <S%H8467>supplication<s%> be <S%H5307>presented<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7725>you,<s%> that you not cause me to return to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> lest I die <S%H4191>there.<s%>

Then <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and they <S%H6485>committed<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> into the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard;<s%> and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H3117>daily<s%> a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> out of the <S%H644>bakers<s%>' <S%H2351>street,<s%> until all the <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H8552>spent.<s%> Thus <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard.<s%>
